content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room watching tv when i caught something out of the corner of my eye.  when i turned to look out the window i saw a glowing green light desend from the top left corner of the window and disappear behind the neighbors house. it fell towards the ground like a meteor would.  i instantly jumped up to look out the window, and saw nothing.  from the time it appeared in the upper left corner of the window to the time it disappeared was only about 3-4 secs.  we have a see-through honeycomb shade that was down so i couldn't tell the distance or how large it was.  the size of light that i saw was about the same size as the street light on the street behind my house, so about 4-5 inches in diameter.  if it was far in the distance, it was pretty big. i am doing this to see if anyone else saw anything, because i am not sure what it could of been.
content.summary: Glowing lime green oval shaped object seen

content.detailedDescription: I was camping with my 13 year old daughter at lake murray near ardmore oklahoma over the weekend and i was setting up my walmart special telescope looking for a star or planet or something i could try to actually find through the viewfinder. i was looking west and noticed an orange light that looked like a star but much brighter. after looking at it for maybe 10-15 seconds it looked like it was moving up and down, almost like it was bouncing. i called my daughter over and told her to look at that star and see if it looks like its moving. thats when the object started making eratic movements side to side makin zig-zags then it looked like it might have made a spiral movement upwards then it would sit still then a few more zig-zags and bounces then it slowly fell behind the tree line. i asked my daughter what that was and she said "that was a ufo". i best estimate is the object was at least 5 to 7 miles away, possibly more and the distance it traveled in the sky while making zig-zags had to be close to a mile or more. the speed it made these movements seems to rule out anything inside flying it since it would be smashed against the inside and i have never seen anything move that fast except in cartoons so i would like to know what the heck it was and what it was doing. i have read a lot of posts here on mufon with similar sightings but not one single answer.
content.summary: Camping at lake murray witnessed orange light zig-zag extremely fast

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were standing outside watching the stars as we usually do and i looked up towards the moon and there it was.  it was moving really fast across the sky and went behind a tree and then disappeared.  it made me and my cousin feel great because of what we just witnessed.  him and i never see too much other than satellites and about six to ten shooting stars a night.
content.summary: Ufo glowing orb.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my daughter to school and both she and i noticed that there were 10 or more jet contrails criss-crossing the sky over the dfw area on friday morning (october 24th).  that was unusual to say the least.  it was then reported on our local news that another sighting had occurred the night before in stephenville which is west of my location.  i live off interstate 20 in grand prairie, texas and stephenville is located off the same interstate.  it was reported by the news that the local joint reserve base was claiming they had f-16s out the evening before but i've never noticed this many contrails before.  these contrails were not fresh as they were thick and fluffy not like the usual ones we see around here which are thinnish. the time we saw these would have been around 7am.  they were all over the sky but several headed off in an easterly direction following the interstate.  it could be related to the air force's claims of maneuvers but it was unusual enough to get our attention.
content.summary: I noticed at least 10 jet contrails over the dfw area the morning after the latest stephenville sighting

content.detailedDescription: We stepped outside to look for the hale-bop coment on march 13, 1997. the same exact night as the lights over phoenix. my husband looked up one way and i looked up another way. as soon as i looked up, i saw a perfect triangle of stars. it was tiny, as it was high up. size of a dime. as soon as i looked at it. a light shot out from the tip of the triangle. now, the light was a pin-prick of a light. so, i never took my eyes off of it. it was getting dimmer and dimmer. i knew it was going higher and higher. it went about half the length of our house at the time, before i lost it from sight. i don't know why, but i never looked at again. when we lived in the that house to see if the triangle was always there in march. i know nothing about constellations. so, i thought, that must have been a mother ship. i did see a star book one time and i looked thru it really quick and did find some stars that were in a triangle. we live up the hill from that house now. so, i will go down there and look up in march. i think, last march 13, it was cloudy, when i thought of it. if it is a constellation. it would be there the whole month of march. just not on the 13. we live in a hilly area. so, we found out, we could only see the comet from down the road.
content.summary: Light shot out  from a triangle, at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
As i was pulling out of my neibhor hood i turned my head to the south to check for oncoming traffic, then i saw the fastes moving object i have ever seen. starting around 80,000 feet (best guess) then at aprox 7,000 feet it stoped abruptly like somthing caught it.  i was first thinking that i was watching a shooting star but i soon changed my mind by the color and direction of travel.

   i am still not sure of what i saw but i will tell you i have seen many shooting stars as i do alot of camping and i have worked the early morning shift for 18 years. the only reason i am reporting this is the feeling i get when the event comes back in my mind i get a feeling of peace , terestial sort of feeling....
content.summary: A fast moving object blue and white in color

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 97 i went alone on a trip to see a freind in idaho. i traveled from texas to moscow idaho. as i stopped at a store before i went north onto route 95 thru the cascade mountains a man told me not to travel thru those parts at that time of night but i continued on.. it must have been around 2-3 in the morning.. i had been on the road alone for hours.. when i saw lights coming up behind me pretty fast..They seemed like normal sized headlights at the time. i was just relieved to not be on the road alone anymore.. i noticed that one of the lights on the vehicle behind me kept flickering brighter than dim..Then really bright..As it got brighter it seemed to grow a little larger but not a huge amount bigger.When i looked in the rear view mirror the two lights became one.... im tryin to figure out what was goin on thru my rear view mirror but then at the same time watch the curvy road in front of me. the the light was considerably larger but then shot up high in the sky.. i tried to see where it went thru my mirrors but was unsuccesful. then i saw a huge blue beam of light come down onto the road behind me and start catchin up to my car..There was no odd sounds that i could hear or remember... i drove as fast as i could while screamin and crying because i was terrified.. im not sure what else happened.. i remember finally finding a town with a light on.. i ran inside and asked a man in a little motel if they ever saw strange lights.. i dont remember his answer..But for some reason it was now 5 in the mornin..I called my friend to find out how long it would take me to get to moscow... he said another hour.. i was scared to get back on the road but even more terrified to stay where i was.. when i got to my friends house and told them what happened they seemed unphased. they told me that "they" wont hurt me that "they" were just checkin me out.  2 girls in the room showed me triangular red markings on their chests on the left side above the breast.. i had the same markings.  in the days to follow i had a large pellet in the bottom fo my right foot that made it very uncomfortable to walk.. if i were to turn my foot over and try to see or feel it.. i couldnt find it.. i could only feel it when i walked..The object slowly moved from the pad of my foot..To the back of my foot..Then i dont know where it went. for a few years after that incedent.. everything electronic around me went crazy... everything is fine now tho!
content.summary: 2 lights  flickered behind my car..Then merged into one..Then went high in the sky..Shot a blue bean down

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and my self were walking up a hill, on a little used, very unlit city street in our small town (population of about 500). it was about 7:00 to 7:30 pm. this was about late october or november so because of the daylight saving time change it was already dark made even darker by the fact that this street is very shaded by trees. as a matter a fact it reminded me of so many other times i had walked this same street, it would be so dark that the only way i would know how to gage how close to either side of the road i was is i knew if i left the pavement to my left and felt gravel i knew to go a little to my right and visversa. we could see the street light at the top of the hill and as soon as we got out from under the shade of the trees we would be able to see just fine.

my friends name was frank and we were going to my house just to hang out for a while.  i was walking on the left with frank just to my right, when just about a third of the way up the hill there was a bright light the best way i can discribe it is it was just like someone was right above us and flashed one of those old flashbulbs like the cameras back then use to have.We both by instick took one step and dove for the ditch, me to the left and frank to the right.I remember thinking this is going to hurt when i land, because i kwew the ditch was washed out and deep my side of the road, frank on the other hand would have a soft landing because the ditch on his side was not only shallow but was grassy.I do not remember hitting the bottom of thr ditch,next thing i knew we were back walking up to the top of the hill. 

frank didnt come to my house, i took a left to my house which was just in sight . i  remembered thinking as he walked away, i sure am glad i'm home because i would be scared to have to go on alone. my next thought was i hope they(by they i knew i ment  aliens) dont get him again, because i thought everyone would think i had done something to him. when i walked in the door the first thing i saw was the clock, it was about two hours later than i thought, then i heard my mother in the kitchen and was afraid she was going to ask why i was later than i had siad i would be. lucky for me she didnt, because i some how knew i was not supposed to tell any thing that had happened.

when i went to bed a lay there and i knew i was supposed to forget everything that had happened,but i was still concerned about frank getting home alright.So i made a deal in my own mind, i thought i will forget everything as soon as i see frank at school monday(this happened on saturday). so monday morning i almost forgot but after second period which was about 10:00 am i remembered and asked a friend. have you seen frank?
to which he replied yes there he is right there, do you want him? i said no thats ok.

i then forgot everything, for about 15 years then for some reason in my late twenties i remembered what had happened , but only the beginning and the end , nothing inbetween.

i never asked frank about this because shortly after this happened he moved 
 away. i have often wondered if he remembers anything

I was driving west down washington st. at approximately 8:30 p.M. on the night of thursday, october 23, 2008, towards the square in downtown stephenville.  i was approximately .5 miles away from the first stop sign you come to at the square.  i spotted the object in the sky just before you get to the bridge over the creek coming into downtown from the intersection of 281 and washington st.  i noticed it because i was looking at the top of the courthouse and a light in the sky caught my attention.  the light was located to the left of the top of the courthouse, and at about a 10 o'clock position from the top of the courthouse.  it would have been located to the southwest of town.  when i first saw it, i thought it might be a flare or a firework, the the intensity of the light never faded.  at further inspection, the object had a orange glow to it, and it was very bright and looked to be fairly large. it did not look to be moving, or if it was, it was moving very slow.  it looked as if there was a trail of light behind it.  i slowed down to take a more deliberate look, and the object looked as if it split apart, and before i knew it, it disappeared.  the entire time i saw it, the object maintained the orange color, even when it "split" apart.  like i said before, at first sight i thought it to be a flare or firework of some sort, but it maintained its level of brightness and it seemed to be stationary.  once it disappeared, it never resurfaced.
content.summary: Orange, large object that split into two then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was on one of my first overnight boyscout hikes in camp kaufman in huntington ny back in 1966. i was walking alone through a large empty grassy field.It was getting very dark and i returning from the trading post  to my campsite. i saw a bright glowing blue creature.My initial thought was that it was a large  penguin...But glowing very brightly. it almost appeared that i could see all the different internal organs beneath the glow. i stopped and stared at it for 10 seconds and then proceeded to run away as fast as i could. of course no one believed me,they thought i was just trying to scare them, but this was not a dark obscure shape in the woods...This was a brightly glowing blue large penguin with blue and yellow internal organs...Or so it appeared.
i never really gave it much thought after that. it wasn't until i was watching the movie signs and they showed a drawing in the book they were reading of a blue glowing alien and there it was..
this was a strange event in my life that seems to confirm my newly discovered beliefs that we are one big digital universe and all our biblical
history was profoundly affected by more advanced technological beings acting on our behalf and that there are hybrids among us. jesus??
"ockhams razor"   plainly stated that simplest answer is usually the correct one. technology or supernatural...Really seems obvious to me.
      thanks for listening
content.summary: Alien encounter.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the summer of 1981 and i was preparing to enter my freshman year at st. olaf college. i was visiting a friend in burnsville minnesota who was joining me at st. olaf college. i went on a date with a girl from lesuer minnesota and she met me in shakopee. at the time shakopee mn was mostly farmland and we parked in an open area. it was quiet and dark out that night because there wasn't many homes or businesses there to illuminate the area. 
we first noticed the ufo when we saw an extremely bright light in the sky. it seemed as high as the other stars. we thought it was a star and spoke about how bright that star was. we listened to about 6 songs on the radio and talked when i noticed that the star was moving. i told the young lady i was with that it was moving and she told me i was seeing things and waved her hand in front of me. she then sat up and saw the same thing i was seeing. 

the object within 2 or 3 minutes was down from high in the sky to down on the horizon and coming towards us. i would guess within another minute or so it was very close to us and going directly over the top of my car. i then told her that i needed to see what this thing was that was now on top of us. the girl was hysterically crying and scared to death. she jumped under the dash of my 78 impala and i jumped out of the car to see this thing. the object was massive, dark in color and triangular shaped. it moved quietly with no sound approximatley 4-5 mph over the top of the car. it seemed to be maybe 100 yards above my car and had strobing multi colored lights on the bottom. it slowly passed over the car and then suddenly with unimaginable speeed it shot off in the distance. 

my mother and i called a branch of the military the next day and they questioned me for about 5 minutes. one of the interesting questions they asked me was did i feel that i had a missing block of time or could not remember somethings. i told them i didn't think so. when they were done questioning me they told me not to talk to anyone about this event. i don't know if i can remember everything and hope that you can have someone contact me about recalling the events that continue to consume me over 25 years later.
content.summary: Very large trangular shaped dark in color with strobing lights

content.detailedDescription:
This is our second incident in one week. we did not know at the time that ufo sightings were coming in from stephensville which is only a few counties over. once we realized that we were seeing the same things here in freestone county from a distance, we decided to report the sightings. we still cannot believe or grasp what we have been witnessing. we are on a ranch in a rural area and observe many things in the night sky (jet patterns, satellites, meteor showers etc.) but have never seen things like these.

here is the information we sent to whitney ashley at the empire tribune in stephensville, this is about the second sighting oct. 28th. i had already been in contact with her about our other sighting october 21st. we also observed strange things in january 2008 but did not report those to anybody. here is a copy of what we sent to whitney:

our back porch is right off our kitchen, we have four dogs on the ranch and i went outside to give two of them a treat at exactly 8:20 pm. i have gotten into the habit of scanning the sky because of what happened last week. as soon as i looked to the south west (in the direction of temple), an object was very evident suspended just above the horizon. i watched it briefly, it was large (i was seeing it from far off), it had a definite red glow and had a faint strobe effect with a whitish blue light emitting around it. at this point, i called out to andy (my significant other) and he came out and started watching it too. he said to go inside and see exactly what time it was. we watched this thing hover just above the horizon from 8:20 to 8:33 pm, so we were able to observe it for a long time. we actually wanted to get into the car and get closer but we knew it was so far away that we would probably lose it. instead andy went inside and got his rifle with a high powered scope on it to use as binoculars. we both looked at it through the scope. we could clearly see an oval or round object that had a red glow, it pulsated. what ever this was, it was big because we were seeing it from a great distance from where it actually was. occasionally it would throw a whitish blue light. we could see other air traffic way high above it (planes fly along i-45 as a normal route). this looked nothing like what else was in the sky. we really could not believe our eyes. it finally just looked like it disappeared over the horizon (or lowered itself to a point we could not see) at exactly 8:33 pm. we wrote it all down when we returned inside with the intension of contacting you, we wanted to know if others saw it too!
this was totally different than what we saw last week. i am curious to know if others in our area are seeing this but so far i have not heard anything. i am the curator for the museum of freestone county and have been researching some information that was sent to me about sightings in the late 1800's. there are newspaper clippings that show that people here in freestone county saw a "space ship" the night of the alleged crash in aurora, tx. the funny thing is, in those days they would not have linked the two locations together.
content.summary: This was our second sighting in a week, but much more dramatic than the first. the first one occured tuesday, oct. 21st. we saw 5 silver bullet looking objects but at that time did not realize that people in stephensville were seeing them at same time.

content.detailedDescription: In 1977/1978 i was living in forest hill, texas. i only remember the approx. year. i was only about 21 years old and had bs'd my way into a job in which i had no skills. one skill i needed was typing so i had immediately enrolled in a night typing course which was in fort worth, texas. i was traveling home on i-20 east. there was not much traffic that time of night. as a matter of fact i do not remember any traffic being present at all which now seems rather strange to me. all of a sudden there was a huge light that was the brightest light i have ever seen, before or since, in my life. while being a bright light it also seemed very white. i slowed down to see what it was but could only see the light. i then realized what the light was showing me. there was a mattress in the lane ahead of me that i would have never seen which would have caused me to have an accident. i pulled to the side of the road forgetting about the mattress and rolled down my window. my first thought was that it was a helicopter but there was absolutely no sound. when i say no sound i mean no sound as in any normal sounds of night or traffic much less a helicopter sound. i wasn't scared. as a matter of a fact i felt a feeling of peace like i have never felt. all of a sudden the light was gone. i went straight home and called carswell air force base in fort worth, texas to report what had just happened. the man they had me talk with said there was absolutely nothing in the area but yet he then questioned me about the whole incident. i never knew who else to report this to until i saw the show "ufos over earth" and got the name of your organization. a few months back i came in on some tv show that someone had reported basically the same event in the same time frame and area. unfortunately i didn't know who to contact about that show. what i experienced back then was the most awesome and peaceful event that anyone could experience. i do not know what it was but i do know it was real, very real. whatever or whoever it was saved me from what could have been a horrible accident. it could not have been some thing from this earth.
content.summary: Brightest light i have ever seen in my life yet it was white with absolutely no sound.

content.detailedDescription: This happened quite a few years ago, so the exact date is foggy in my mind, but i remember it being around november 2000. i then lived in the town of new lenox,il. it was approximately 12:00am, i remember it being that time, because i was driving with my girlfriend and that's when she needed to be home. as i was driving south i noticed this bright flashing/sparkling light, it was flashing faster than any strobe light i have seen, and it was all different colors. it seemed to be low in the southern sky, but far off in the distance. i noticed this light because it was flashing so many colors so rapidly, it seemed to just be hovering in the sky, i thought it may be a helicopter in the distance, but i had never seen lights of this kind. it was not very bright,but it was twinkling different colors, that is the best way i can describe it.. i asked my girlfriend if she was seeing what i was seeing, and at that point trees were blocking the view, and it went out of sight behind some branches, but there were no leaves on the trees.  as i came to the end of the neighborhood, the street curves to the right and i had to turn heading west. now at this point i am looking out my left window drivers side. as i passed the trees there was a small clearing between the branches when the flashing lights became visible again, i started to slow the car to stop, i wanted my girlfriend to see this. now this was the crazy part, and probably the strangest occurance of my life i am about to tell you. before i had even slowed to say 10 miles an hour, i'm watching these lights when i see a bright flash and what i call the check mark, or light tail left in the sky, greenish in color and seemed to fade away instantaniously.. i was freaked out! goose bumps... i had to stop the car..  i got out and looked up in the sky where it was, and nothing was there.. i looked all around in the sky.. nothing. i just remember having this feeling at the time of wonderment,amazment,astonished, maybe even a slight fear. i remember feeling like, wow, was i at the right place, at the right time.. from the first spotting the lights to when it vanished in a flash of light all occured within approx 15 seconds.. this was a very short,but very memorable experience..  needless to say, since then i have always kept my eye on the sky.
content.summary: Driving in my car i witnessed a sparkling object far off in the southern sky, seconds later a bright flash and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: In 1977/1978 i was living in forest hill, texas. i only remember the approx. year. i was only about 21 years old and had bs'd my way into a job in which i had no skills. one skill i needed was typing so i had immediately enrolled in a night typing course which was in fort worth, texas. i was traveling home on i-20 east. there was not much traffic that time of night. as a matter of fact i do not remember any traffic being present at all which now seems rather strange to me. all of a sudden there was a huge light that was the brightest light i have ever seen, before or since, in my life. while being a bright light it also seemed very white. i slowed down to see what it was but could only see the light. i then realized what the light was showing me. there was a mattress in the lane ahead of me that i would have never seen which would have caused me to have an accident. i pulled to the side of the road forgetting about the mattress and rolled down my window. my first thought was that it was a helicopter but there was absolutely no sound. when i say no sound i mean no sound as in any normal sounds of night or traffic much less a helicopter sound. i wasn't scared. as a matter of a fact i felt a feeling of peace like i have never felt. all of a sudden the light was gone. i went straight home and called carswell air force base in fort worth, texas to report what had just happened. the man they had me talk with said there was absolutely nothing in the area but yet he then questioned me about the whole incident. i never knew who else to report this to until i saw the show "ufos over earth" and got the name of your organization. a few months back i came in on some tv show that someone had reported basically the same event in the same time frame and area. unfortunately i didn't know who to contact about that show. what i experienced back then was the most awesome and peaceful event that anyone could experience. i do not know what it was but i do know it was real, very real. whatever or whoever it was saved me from what could have been a horrible accident. it could not have been some thing from this earth.
content.summary: Brightest light i have ever seen in my life yet it was white with absolutely no sound.

content.detailedDescription: The whole family was outside on the front porch.I had my back to the north, my wife faced east.She had been saying something to me when she noticed the object over my head to the north, and asked if i saw it. i emediatly spotted a metallic cigar shaped object hanging vertically in the sky.I had no idea what it was. at that time it did not appear to be moving much. i then went into the house to get the camera. i returned seconds later and snapped three shots then proceeded to take a 3 min. 18 sec. video of the object. during this time it became appairent the object was moving but at a slow rate.The obeject, at times, appeared as if it were going to flip to a horizontal possion but never acheived it. i guess the best way to discribe it is "swinging like a pendelem on a clock." on the video you hear me state the winds were out of the west, however they were actually out of the south west. after taking the video i had speculated the object had something to do with the wal-mart convention taking place in fayetteville that day, however we live about 25 miles south of where that convention was taking place. we walked to the yard still taking pictures and watching it move slowly to the east until we could not see it anymore. i've tried to reationalize, and even debunk what we saw that day, but with no sucsess. none of the universities in the area knew of any weather expiriments takeing place that day, nor did the local tv stations
content.summary: Object appaired in north sky and was first seen by my wife.  then  slowly floated to the east.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were headed home last night. we were headed w on highway 377 when at around 7:50 pm we saw a series of strange lights. the best way that i could describe it is that there were about 3 sets of lights, with each set having about 3 white lights each. they were in a sort of semi-circle shape. all 3 sets never were shining at the same time. it was the first set on the far left that caught my attention. then they started blinking every couple of seconds back in forth in no particular order. this lasted for about 20 seconds or so. what was really funny was that i got my phone out to take a picture, and right when i pulled it out they were gone. 

immediatley after they dissapered we saw 2 planes flying very low to the ground. we live out in the country, so once we got home we sat outside to see if we could see anything else. the planes patroled the area for a good 20 minutes or so.

the lights were so close that i seriously think they werent but maybe two to three football field lenghts away. it was pretty neat and scary at the same time!
content.summary: 3 sets of 3 white lights blinking back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
I have never told anyone other than close friends about this event.  i've seen things about mufon on t.V. i've always felt a little weird about telling my friends about this since as you can imagine how it sounds to someone who has never seen anything.  
  i remember everything about this event other than the exact date.  it was warm outside and i was a senior in high school.  so it had to of been early fall 92', or late spring 93'.  it was between 12 midnight and 2 a.M.  i was playing basketball outside in one of my friend's parent's driveway.  there was 4 of us playing.  after playing for about an hour we were thirsty, so the other three went inside to get a drink.  i stayed outside because i felt uncomfortable about going inside since my friend's mother had yelled at us earlier about being too loud.  i continued to shoot the basketball in the driveway.  after a few minutes i started to notice this "humming" sound.  it seemed to get louder and louder and then seemed to be coming from above me.  i then looked straight up towards the noise, that's when i seen the disc.  it was hovering above me at about 50-75 ft.  it was just above the tops of the big oak trees that were in the yard.  it was made of metal, i would say aluminum.  i would place the diameter of the disc at 20-30 ft.  it had one light in the center of the disc, a blueish/white light.  it wasn't a spot light like you see on t.V., it was just a light like on airplanes.  it looked like the skin of an airplane.  pieces of aluminum sheets.  to me it looked man-made.  i'm not sure how long it had been hovering above me before i looked up, but i do know that after i looked up i said aloud "holy s***" and before i got the whole phrase out it took off.  i have never seen anything move that fast before, especially from a dead stop.  it shot off to roughly where the road was at the end of the driveway.  a distance of about 20-30 yards.  it's hovering height remained the same.  it moved that fast in the blink of an eye!  it came to a complete stop too.  i know that inertia would kill someone inside after doing what i seen it do.  i started walking down the driveway towards it, kind of in disbelief.  after i got about half-way down the driveway it started moving slowly over the trees and houses, like it was done with me or something.  i jogged down the road for a while trying to keep it in sight but disappeared after a while towards the north-west.  when i got back to the house, all the guys were outside questioning me where had i been and why i was out of breathe.  i told them what i had seen, but i could tell they didn't believe me. i haven't seen anything like it since.  this all took place by wolf lake, outside of the city of muskegon.  

i would like to know if any other reports came from the same time in the same area.  this has been something that's kind of haunted me every since it happened.
content.summary: I was deliberately "targeted" by an aluminum looking disc for observation.

content.detailedDescription: One bright and one lighter star south of sacramento at 55 degrees alt, about half moon width apart.  dim star slowly disappears, then bright star slowly disappears.  cloudless sky.
content.summary: Two stars disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog after getting home from a late class. it was after 11pm cst but not yet 11:30. my dog was lingering in a parking lot so i looked up as i often do to observe the stars. i saw what i thought was a plane without it's landing lights on. i thought that was strange because i expected the dimmer lights to be red and green for port and starboard. they were orangish and the craft never made any noise at all! it moved in a straight line over downtown dallas at an almost due south direction; slightly east. i watched for 20 minutes for other crafts or for it to return and saw nothing. it was larger than the little dipper which was also in the south east sky.
content.summary: 3 orange lights in a large triangle formation moving s/se making no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash.  my wife was asleep.  after taking out the trash, it was a very clear sky and i thought i would enjoy it for a second.  i spend most of my time inside and wanted to take a look around.  i tried to find the big or little dipper unsuccessfully.  then i thought i saw orion.  which reminded me of an argument i had with a friend over the constellation.  but below orion's belt (or what i think is orion) i saw a small cluster of stars.  it looked pretty, but i couldn't say i saw that ever before.  i thought it must be some constellation i didn't know.  but it was about 5-7 stars in a group.  i decided to watch in for a few moments when i noticed that the stars were moving.  the group of stars moved as a whole across the night sky.  they seemed very far away and difficult to be certain at first, but they moved as a group in different directions.  the stars moved very slowly and without a sound.  i also noticed that not only the cluster moved, but also that 3 or 5 of the stars would change position.  the 'object' appeared to be in the shape of a cross or letter 't'.  only two stars that never moved made up the tail or the 'i' shaped part of the cluser.  the other 3 to 5 stars would disappear and reappear in a similar orientation.  there was no blinking and all the lights appeared the same size.  i watched this for about 30-45 minutes, taking several breaks inside to warm up and get my camera.  i thought about waking up my wife, but she would think i was being and idiot.  so i took as many pictures and video as possible, however my camera did not capture much at all.  on film, i feel they would have looked like stars.  i did watch for long enough to notice that i made its way across the sky partially.  it went from the east headed west, but never crossed over my head.  it would occassionally fully stop and change directions.  i grew up in the country and watch the star for many nights.  i know what an airplane looks like.  this was far different from anything i have ever seen.  i called a hotline who told me this was a star.  but i am quite sure that stars don't move and don't move in a group. my feelings while watching this were excited, cold, interested, in awe, anxious and wanted to wake the neighborhood and my wife.  i took several photographs and video and made several trip inside because i had watched for so long.  i did not lose sight of the object, it is likely out my window right now!  but it is cold, i can't seem to document it and no one else seems to care.  i don't feel comfortable calling local news and be made to look foolish in my town.  i am a fairly well respected individual. i do not know what this was and i am not saying it was alien.  it was an unidentified flying object to me.  thanks for your time.  i hope this reaches someone in time so that other may view what i viewed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cluster of moving stars that moved together in several directions.  the stars moved individually and in a group.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching tv when i heard the dogs barking so i went outside.My pittbull was barking and looking up at the sky its a dense fog i looked back down tought maybe he had seen a deer in the yard .But he was still looking up then the sky  lit up bright white round light.I looked over at it it was over the trees in my back yard i had a spotlight so i shined it over at it.To try and see what it was tought maybe a air plane light or somthing but made no sound flashed my spotlight and it changed colors from white to red to silver then back to white then it went outand now it looked like a egg when it came back on red and changed to a yellowish orange it moved down very slow and was changed colors fast all of a sudden it moved up about well i say 60 feet stopped and changed back to white then flew stright up like a streak and was gone.I am sitting here shaking still i have not told anyonei just looked back outside and you cannot see a star in the sky because of the fog  it now is 12.20 am oct 30 2008
content.summary: I seen it in my backyard it was round very bright white then changed shap and colors

content.detailedDescription:
I was twelve or thirteen when one evening just before dark i was pulling into the driveway with my parents in andover ks. they went inside but for some reason i stayed outsise it was a partly cloudy day really quite perfect for kansas no wind not cold as i stood on my driveway looking up at some clouds thats when i noticed the object it appeared out of thin air
but all i could see is these lights a bright but soft light they were rotating counter-clockwise around what could have been a disc shape craft but the craft itself was invisible i was in shock for about the first second or two but then i became inthrawled with it i wanted to see a definate sign of this is a ufo it was so close to me across the street form my driveway there was a streetlite it was stationary about twenty feet away from the top of the pole i could have thrown arock and hit it
then as the lites were going around then a different shaped lite started to flash in my direction from the center of the ufo it flashed rapidly then just as it had appeared it vanished i am a construction worker now i can judge the size of things good it was to small for a human to fit in
content.summary: I saw what appeared to be white lites rotating.

content.detailedDescription: A large blue meteor like fire ball fell from the sky. i was driving home from brighton and saw it. my room mate saw debris fall into a neer by car dealership. police and fire trucks in the area, claim to be investigating a hostage situation. to many police to believe that. media helicopters in route were removed by military helos. large mass of people are watching the area, i cam't be the only one who saw it.
content.summary: Large blue fire ball fell from sky

content.detailedDescription: I have observed sevel times most of the time two star like objects about one every couple of weeks from my backyard flying from a south to north direction too high too be a plane no flash or red or blue position lights like a plane one is usesuly bright blue like the north star and the the other one is dim white today i saw the same thing on diffence i saw one bright blue star like light and 4 dim white light flying from the southwest going northwest direction no sound moved at about 10000 ft plus attude and disspeared towards the san gabriel mountain range did not have regular air craft position lights. this time i saw it from my frt yard about 5-10min after a power outage on block. i was smoking a ciggrett when i witness it i did not take my eyes off of it and i used other bright stars in the sky as a refence point to verify that they were moving. i thought at first it was possibly the internal space station or possible satalites but they were too close together in my opinon to be satalitte.
content.summary: Star like one bright blue and five dim white

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:15a.M. my dogs and i awoke to the after burners of a fighter jet kicking in over head. that got my attention. a cold front had pushed through the previous day so the humidity was around 26% and no clouds. i threw on my jacket and went outside to see what was up because they are not supposed to be kicking in after burners at that time of night over the city.  my backyard faces north. as i was looking north, motion to my right caught my attention. at this point the sound of the jet was gone.  i noticed three objects spinning and dancing around each other but traveling fast in one direction going from north to south. they quit dancing around each other and one disk dipped below the others. it then changed to a color as i would discribe that like a florescent light. the red was vivid and bright. the actual sighting took no longer than 5 seconds at the most.  but the thing that stood out in my mind was the absolute quiet.  we do have an air force base in our town. so, if what i saw is ours.....Yay for us.

i later thought it may have been geese or other large migratory birds caught in one hell of a tail wind but the accrobatics of these disks were just too rapid.

after the sightings i went back to bed knowing what i had just seen was out of the ordinary. this makes my fourth sighting in my life. my first was when i was 6. my second was when i was 12. my third was when i was 22, in the air force and was in amarillo texas.

i find this event very interesting and would like to know if anayone has reported anything in this area over the last few days.
content.summary: Three disks, red, n. to s. direction dancing around each other but moving at a high rate of speed in one direction.

content.detailedDescription: I left my house at approximately 7:45 to pick up my fiance from work.  when i got to rent-a-center (his work) i sat in the car for a few minutes waiting for him to come out.  i saw something out of the corner of my eye (to the left) and saw three orangish-yellow lights hovering.  they formed a single line that pointed up at a diagonal and the highest point was to the left.  i watched them disappear and reappear and each time the lights disappeared and reappeared, they were at the same angle just a little higher in the sky.  i ran into the store to tell my fiance and his co worker to come outside and they came out in time to see the lights a couple of times before they disappeared. i tried to record some video on my cell phone, but as soon as i got the camera setting on it activated the lights were gone.  we waited for about 5 minutes to see if anything would show, but nothing else happened.  there was no sound during the entire event.  after we saw the last lights disappear, we saw a plane flying through the same air space where the lights had previously been, and we could identify the plane and hear it, unlike the lights we saw only moments before.
content.summary: Saw 3 orange lights moving at an upward diagonal to the left and lights came on and off

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from our mailboxes at our apartment complex in brownwood, texas.  i saw three orange lights pretty close together flash one at a time.  i stopped and kept looking.  it happened again right around the same area.  there were trees close to blocking my view, so i moved past the trees so i could see clear skies.  lower in the horizon, i saw it again, only in a different spot.  3 orange lights, 1, 2, 3, taking turns to flash one time before going completely dark.  they were orange circles.  i saw this happen 5 times total before i saw an aircraft that was surely an airplane of some sort flying through that area.  after that i stood around looking for about 20 more minutes, saw a few more planes and that's all, nothing out of the ordinary!  i know for sure that the orange lights i saw was not airplanes.
content.summary: Orange circular lights over brownwood

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were driving home from a restaurant on a two lane paved road (route 302) about 1 mile from our home.  we were travelling at about 45 mph at the time of the sighting.  most of the road is lined with trees except for an occasional home, business or other clearing.   we were driving past a parking lot that is accross the street from a local ski area. my husband happened to be looking in the direction of the parking lot and quite suddenly two sets of very bright lights appeared in the sky just over the tree line at the back of the lot.  he screamed "what the heck is that!", i had been talking to my children in the back seat and turned my head to see. the lights were in the sky, fixed, with no movement.  we later believed they must have been "attached" to the same object since they seemed so fixed.  they were very low, less than one tree length on top of the tree line about 100 yards away from our vehicle.  they looked like two "sets"  with four lights each, similar to those in an outdoor sports stadium.  they were actually larger than the lights at the local high school stadium.  their appearance was so sudden and bright we were slow to react and continued to drive for 15-20 seconds before we pulled over.  during this time, our view was again blocked by the tree line.  when we pulled over there was nothing there...No lights, no sound.  we went home and stood outside, convinced we had just seen a ufo.  our children continued to ask us what was wrong, why did we pull over and why were we using so many bad words!  we could not explain how these huge light would suddenly turn on in the sky from no where.

the next day my husband went back to find a reasonable explanation (construction lights or new parking lot lights??) there was nothing.  there are condominiums behind the parking lot and my husband randomly drove around and asked people who were outside if they had seen any strange lights the night before around 8:00.  one couple looked at him very strangely and said that they had seen strange lights (stadium style) at 9:30 the previous night but not in this same spot.  they happened to be driving 15 miles away on another road (route 112). they thought they were passing a newly constucted building but realized there are no buildings on route 112 (it is national forest).  they also said they saw the lights appear twice, turn on and off in the sky and appear again a few miles down the road.

over the next two weeks we told many people and heard from 3 others that they had seen some strange lights in the sky that evening but all had seen it from a distance (a mile or more).  one person we told said he heard strange "hovering" sounds behind his house over the trees around the same time.  he said it sounded like a plane hovering and passing back and forth over the trees.  he looked outside and saw nothing.

we are hoping to find others who have seen something similar or, even better,would be a reasonable explanation for this sighting.  we certainly can't think of one!
content.summary: Two set of stadium style lights appeared sunddenly over an opening in the trees

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my balcony smoking a cigarrete, i looked up at the sky and there was nothing as in stars or a moon or clouds it was very clear there was only 3 lights on the sky in the form of a triangle i stood there for about one minute looking at it and then i ran back inside my apartment to tell my wife about it so that she could come out and look at it so that when i told her she wouldnt think i was crazy. and i also got my binoculars so i could see it better and when i went to look at it and focus it right it was gone, when i came outside i saw it again and when i tried to focuss on it with my binoculars it moved at a very high rate of speed it moved to another position in the sky but it was stremely fast then i took my binoculars of my face and sure there it was at a different spot then were i had seen it to begin with then when i tried to focuss on it again at where it had moved to it moved again back to place where i had first seen it then i saw it for about 30 seconds and i ran back in the house to tell my wife that she had to see that cause it was something that u dont see everyday and she was still to scared and denied to come outside with me so i got mad at her cause i really wanted her to see it so i ran back outside and it was still there but there was no more movement by that time my heart was pounding so hard cause i had no clue what it was and i said to my self there is nothing in this world that can move that fast and just be standing there and i was really scared i was shacking my eyes could not believe what i was seeing and just like that in the blink of an eye it was gone i didnt see it leaving or nothing i dont know if the lights just went off or it flew away i have no clue just that fast it was gone. but what really inpressed me was the speed it moved with it was something really out of this world and i could not sleep for a whole week or more i kept dreaming about it the only one that listen to me was my boss at work ............ thank you for letting me get this of my chest!!!!!!!!!!! please if there is anyway i would like for someone to contact me so i can tell them my story cause i swear on everuthing i love i know what i saw and im not lying all i want to do is let u guys know what i saw u dont even have to public this its just to get it out of chest like i said. my number is 918-406-5907 thank you i will be specting your call  erick sanchez
content.summary: I saw 3 lights in for of a triangle
